H0.text: What was the name of Matilda’s teacher, who adopted her at the end of the book. Miss Thompson

H1.text: What was the name of Matilda’s teacher, who adopted her at the end of the book. Mrs. Phelps

H2.text: What was the name of Matilda’s teacher, who adopted her at the end of the book. Miss Wilkinson

H3.text: What was the name of Matilda’s teacher, who adopted her at the end of the book. Miss Honey

A4.text: Matilda asks permission to live with Miss Honey, to which her parents rather distractedly agree. Matilda and Miss Honey find their happy ending, as the Wormwoods drive away, never to be seen again.
